00001 <h2>Browse the online De Mauro Paravia Italian dictionary</h2>

00003         <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px"

00007 <p>
00008         Using De Mauro Widget you can search words in the online Italian dictionary
00009         <a href="http://www.demauroparavia.it" class="external">De Mauro Paravia</a> from Dashboard.
00010 </p>
00011 <p>
00012         Type any word in the search field, then press the Enter key.
00013         The widget will open in the default web browser the results page.
00014 </p>
00015 <p>
00016         De Mauro Widget requires Mac OS X 10.4 &ldquo;Tiger&rdquo; or later and an Internet connection (broadband recommended).
00017 </p>
